resources.string: UniClip is a cross-device clipboard synchronization app.\n\nEver wanted to quickly copy a link, or an email from your mobile to your tablet or your PC or the other way around? UniClip does just that. Its easy, intuitive, and of course, lightning fast!

You can change app theme, and whether or not you need device to vibrate or send notifications when new data arrives. You can also change the number of shakes required and shake sensitivity to accept incoming cloudboard data.
Shake it, if you want it!

When new data arrives to your device, you get a brief window of 5 seconds (marked by vibrations) within which you need to shake your device a few number of times (this can be changed in the settings) to copy the incoming data to your device\'s clipboard.

UniClip maintains a clipboard history of the session. So, if you miss something, don\'t worry, just go to the Menu and click on the History icon.\n\n
